title: 这是我们的到岸价报价表

conversations.english: Have you worked out the offers. Mr. Zhou?周先生，你们把报价做出来了吗？
conversations.chinese: 周先生，你们把报价做出来了吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, we have. Here's our CIF quotation sheet. Please have a careful look.做出来了。这是我们的到岸价报价表。请您仔细过目。
conversations.reply_chinese: 做出来了。这是我们的到岸价报价表。请您仔细过目。

conversations.english: I understand we will need seven air conditioning units on the two floors.That's what you think, yes?我了解我们需要七部空调机在两个楼面。你是这个意思，对吧？
conversations.chinese: 我了解我们需要七部空调机在两个楼面。你是这个意思，对吧？
conversations.reply_english: Yes. You could use five or six units.But five or six wouldn't be very efficient. I recommend seven.是的。你可以装五到六部。但五到六部会不够，所以我建议七部。
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的。你可以装五到六部。但五到六部会不够，所以我建议七部。

conversations.english: I’m interested in all kinds of your products, but this time I would like to order some fireworks and mosquito coil incense. Please quote us C.I.F. Rangoon.我对你们所有的产品都感兴趣，但这次我想购买烟火和蚊香。请报CIF仰光到岸价。
conversations.chinese: 我对你们所有的产品都感兴趣，但这次我想购买烟火和蚊香。请报CIF仰光到岸价。
conversations.reply_english: Please let us know the quantity required so that we can work out the premium and freight charges.请你说明需求数量，以便我们计算出保险费和运费。
conversations.reply_chinese: 请你说明需求数量，以便我们计算出保险费和运费。

conversations.english: I hope we could offer the most favorable terms.希望我们能提供给您最有利的条款。
conversations.chinese: 希望我们能提供给您最有利的条款。
conversations.reply_english: I am sure you will find our prices are most competitive. Here is our offer. All the prices on the list are firm. If your order is a sizeable one, we could reconsider our prices.我相信您会发现我们的价格是最有竞争力的。这是我们的报价。所列的所有价格都已确认。如果您的订单量够大，我们会重新定价。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我相信您会发现我们的价格是最有竞争力的。这是我们的报价。所列的所有价格都已确认。如果您的订单量够大，我们会重新定价。

conversations.english: I have here our price sheet on a F.O.B. basis. The prices are given without engagement.这是我们船上交货价的价目单。所报价格没有约束力。
conversations.chinese: 这是我们船上交货价的价目单。所报价格没有约束力。
conversations.reply_english: Good, if you’ll excuse me, I’ll go over the sheet right now.很好。如果可以，我马上把价目单看一遍。
conversations.reply_chinese: 很好。如果可以，我马上把价目单看一遍。

conversations.english: This is our rock bottom price, Mr. Li. We can't make any further concessions.李先生，这是我方的最低价格，不能再让了。
conversations.chinese: 李先生，这是我方的最低价格，不能再让了。
conversations.reply_english: If that's the case, there's not much point in further discussion. We might as well call the whole deal off.如果是这样的话，那就没有什么必要再谈下去了，我们是不是干脆放弃这笔生意算了！
conversations.reply_chinese: 如果是这样的话，那就没有什么必要再谈下去了，我们是不是干脆放弃这笔生意算了！

conversations.english: What are your terms of payment?您要求的付款方式是什么?
conversations.chinese: 您要求的付款方式是什么?
conversations.reply_english: Our terms are net 30.三十天内付清货款.
conversations.reply_chinese: 三十天内付清货款.

conversations.english: We are interested in placing a large order for your wool carpet.我们有兴趣跟你们订大量的羊毛毯。
conversations.chinese: 我们有兴趣跟你们订大量的羊毛毯。
conversations.reply_english: How much would you like?您的订量是多少呢？
conversations.reply_chinese: 您的订量是多少呢？

title: 谈判很愉快且富有成果

conversations.english: To get around your difficulty, Mr. Brown, I'd suggest that you reduce your order by half. You can send in an addi tional order later.布朗先生，我建议你把订单数量削减一半以摆脱你的困难。你可以以后再下追加订单。
conversations.chinese: 布朗先生，我建议你把订单数量削减一半以摆脱你的困难。你可以以后再下追加订单。
conversations.reply_english: Well, I'll consider the possibility. By the way, when do I open the L/C if I want the goods to be delivered in June?喔，我考虑一下这种可能性。顺便问一下，如果我想要你们六月份交货的话，我需要在什么时候开立信用证呢？
conversations.reply_chinese: 喔，我考虑一下这种可能性。顺便问一下，如果我想要你们六月份交货的话，我需要在什么时候开立信用证呢？

title: 你们产品的批发价是多少

conversations.english: How much do you pay wholesale for your products?你们产品的批发价是多少?
conversations.chinese: 你们产品的批发价是多少?
conversations.reply_english: We have a few different wholesale vendors, so our cost varies a bit over the fiscal year. But the difference is miniscule, a fluctuation of about 0.2%.我们几个批发商的情况都不一样,所以本会计年度的费用支出不好确定.但差别很小,大约上下浮动0.2%.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们几个批发商的情况都不一样,所以本会计年度的费用支出不好确定.但差别很小,大约上下浮动0.2%.

conversations.english: You got our email with all the specifications for the project. We'll be accepting bids untill noon on Tuesday. If you have any questions between now and then,please let me know.我们给你发的邮件中有这个项目的所有详细说明,我们接受投标的时间是周二中午之前.如果你这段时间有什么问题的话,请告诉我...
conversations.chinese: 我们给你发的邮件中有这个项目的所有详细说明,我们接受投标的时间是周二中午之前.如果你这段时间有什么问题的话,请告诉我...
conversations.reply_english: Actually, I did have a question. We'd like to know what you had in mind for the budget on this project. We are hoping to put together a really competitive bid. But at the same time, we'd like to hit your target price,too.事实上,我确实有个问题.我们想知道你们对这个项目的预算是多少.我们希望提供一个真正有竞争力的出价,但同时我们也想达到你们的目标价位.
conversations.reply_chinese: 事实上,我确实有个问题.我们想知道你们对这个项目的预算是多少.我们希望提供一个真正有竞争力的出价,但同时我们也想达到你们的目标价位.

conversations.english: Is there any way you can cut us a better deal on your wholesale price for this order?这份订单还有没有办法在批发价上达成更好的协议?
conversations.chinese: 这份订单还有没有办法在批发价上达成更好的协议?
conversations.reply_english: We did the best that we could to give you a low price. Did you get our recent estimate?我们已经尽力给你们一个较低的价格.你看到我们最近的估价了吗?
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们已经尽力给你们一个较低的价格.你看到我们最近的估价了吗?

conversations.english: Is there any way we could get a better warranty on this product?这种产品还有没有条件更优惠的保单?
conversations.chinese: 这种产品还有没有条件更优惠的保单?
conversations.reply_english: Well, I can't give you a better warranty, if you would be willing to agree to an annual contract.有的,如果你们同意签一年的合同,我就给你们提供更优惠的保单.
conversations.reply_chinese: 有的,如果你们同意签一年的合同,我就给你们提供更优惠的保单.

conversations.english: I love your little Lulu dolls.How much for a batch of 6,000?我喜欢你们的小露露娃娃。一批6000个要多少钱？
conversations.chinese: 我喜欢你们的小露露娃娃。一批6000个要多少钱？
conversations.reply_english: For a batch of 6,000 we would charge two dollars a doll .your total cost would be $12,000.一批6000个,我们算两美元一个.总共12000美元.
conversations.reply_chinese: 一批6000个,我们算两美元一个.总共12000美元.

conversations.english: Is this the Law Firm of A & B ?请问是A
conversations.chinese: 请问是A
conversations.reply_english: Yes,sir.how can I help you ?是的,先生.您找谁?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的,先生.您找谁?

conversations.english: I’ve come to hear about your offer for bristles.我是来听取你们对猪鬃的报盘。
conversations.chinese: 我是来听取你们对猪鬃的报盘。
conversations.reply_english: We have the offer ready for you. Let me see ... here it is. 100 cases Houston Bristles, 57 mm, at 10 pounds sterling per kilogram, C.I.F European Main Ports, for shipment in June 2001. The offer is valid for five days.我们已为你准备好了报盘。让我找一找啊，在这里，100箱57毫米休斯敦猪鬃，每公斤成本加运费保险费到欧洲主要口岸价10英镑，2001年6月交货。报盘五天有效。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我们已为你准备好了报盘。让我找一找啊，在这里，100箱57毫米休斯敦猪鬃，每公斤成本加运费保险费到欧洲主要口岸价10英镑，2001年6月交货。报盘五天有效。

title: 双方价格差距还是很大

conversations.english: Mrs. Wang, would you give us an idea of the price you regard as workable?王小姐，你认为什么价格可行呢？
conversations.chinese: 王小姐，你认为什么价格可行呢？
conversations.reply_english: As I said before, your price is so high that we find it difficult to make a bid. We hope you will take the initiative and bridge the gap.我讲过，你方价格太高使我们很难还价，希望你方能主动弥合差距。
conversations.reply_chinese: 我讲过，你方价格太高使我们很难还价，希望你方能主动弥合差距。

title: 从你们工厂订的货需要多少钱

conversations.english: How much will our order from your factory be?我们从你们工厂订的货需要多少钱?
conversations.chinese: 我们从你们工厂订的货需要多少钱?
conversations.reply_english: I'll be happy to get back to you with an estimate in the next few days.过几天我很乐意给你们一个估价单.
conversations.reply_chinese: 过几天我很乐意给你们一个估价单.

title: 希望能和你们达成协议

conversations.english: I really hope to reach an agreement with you today that is suitable and beneficial for us both. I've thought through a lot of these details, and I hope we can have a chance to discuss them and resolve any differences this afternoon.我非常希望今天能和你们达成协议,这对我们双方都合适而且有益.这些细节我都详细考虑过了,而且我希望我们今天下午能有机会讨论一下,解决这些分歧.
conversations.chinese: 我非常希望今天能和你们达成协议,这对我们双方都合适而且有益.这些细节我都详细考虑过了,而且我希望我们今天下午能有机会讨论一下,解决这些分歧.
conversations.reply_english: Let's get start. What kinds of things do you have in mind? If you let us know the requirements you have from the very beginning, we can work through each one until we can come to an agreement.那我们就开始吧.你们有什么想法?如果你们从一开始就让我们知道你们的要求的话,我们可以一一解决并最终达成协议.
conversations.reply_chinese: 那我们就开始吧.你们有什么想法?如果你们从一开始就让我们知道你们的要求的话,我们可以一一解决并最终达成协议.

title: 卤素灯不可能有那么贵

conversations.english: We've got a problem...it looks like we'll need more spotlights on the exhibition booth. The client thinks it's too dark,and they want to add halogen lighting. We've already got 3 sets of track lighting from you guys,do you think you could help us out and throw in some halogens?我们遇到个问题,好像展览棚还需要更多的聚光灯.那个客户认为光线太暗了,他们想要增加卤素灯.我们已经从你们那里拿了3套轨道灯,你看你们能不能帮帮忙,再额外送一些卤素灯?
conversations.chinese: 我们遇到个问题,好像展览棚还需要更多的聚光灯.那个客户认为光线太暗了,他们想要增加卤素灯.我们已经从你们那里拿了3套轨道灯,你看你们能不能帮帮忙,再额外送一些卤素灯?
conversations.reply_english: Oh...Um...I don't think so. you know the halogen lighting is much more expensive than your track lighting system. Plus I'm going to have to call in some guys to install it for you. That's not going to come cheap.哦...我看不行.你知道卤素灯比你们的轨道灯照明系统要贵的多.再加上我还要请人给你们安装.那可不是一点儿费用就能办到的.
conversations.reply_chinese: 哦...我看不行.你知道卤素灯比你们的轨道灯照明系统要贵的多.再加上我还要请人给你们安装.那可不是一点儿费用就能办到的.

conversations.english: We agree to give you a break on the price, all together a discount of 6%. Good news is, I talked to my boss, he confirmed that if you take care of the shipping costs, we'll throw in insurance.我们同意给你们减价,总共是94折.好消息是,我和老板谈过,他确认如果你们承担船运费用的话,我们会额外赠送保险费.
conversations.chinese: 我们同意给你们减价,总共是94折.好消息是,我和老板谈过,他确认如果你们承担船运费用的话,我们会额外赠送保险费.
conversations.reply_english: Great! I'd love to get a little better discount than 6%, but if your company provides the insurance, that will save us a few bucks...太好了!我本来很想要你们提供比94折再高点儿的折扣,但是如果你们提供保险的话,那样也会给我们节约不少钱...
conversations.reply_chinese: 太好了!我本来很想要你们提供比94折再高点儿的折扣,但是如果你们提供保险的话,那样也会给我们节约不少钱...

conversations.english: Excuse me may I know the name of your corporation?劳驾, 我能知道你们公司的名字吗?
conversations.chinese: 劳驾, 我能知道你们公司的名字吗?
conversations.reply_english: China National Textiles Import and Export Corporation中国纺织品进出口公司。
conversations.reply_chinese: 中国纺织品进出口公司。

conversations.english: Do you think I should turn down his offer?你认为我应该拒绝他的报价吗？
conversations.chinese: 你认为我应该拒绝他的报价吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes,it's the correct thing to do.应该，正该这样。
conversations.reply_chinese: 应该，正该这样。
